title: The Hurtin' Club
description: Swedish artist Martin Bladh makes his Kiddiepunk debut with this searing experimental novella in the form of an evil children’s book which explores the darkest corners of a child’s fantasy world.Doubling as an exploration of satanic ritual abuse and the different forms of therapy used on children to “prove” this abuse, “The Hurtin’ Club” is the culmination of Bladh’s personal investigations into the satanic panic phenomenon that spread through the Western world during the ‘80s and early ‘90s.
author: Martin Bladh
